inclusion.criterion: previous history of two clinical neurological attacks
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: two clinical neurological attacks separated in time and in spatial location

inclusion.criterion: Clinical and MRI findings of a single enhancing lesion in the brain or spine
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: multiple T2 hyperintensities in the juxtacortical, periventricular or infratentorial white matter
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: history of treatment with nitrates for heart condition
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: history of carotid artery stenosis or evidence of greater than 50% carotid stenosis on screening MR angiogram
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: history of reaction to MR contrast agents specifically gadopentetate dimeglumine
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has a confirmed diagnosis of Relapsing Remitting Multiple Sclerosis (RRMS) and meets some inclusion criteria, but also has several exclusion criteria that make her likely ineligible for the study.
